Source.name: JDE Distribution sensor: Orphaned Records F00095
Source.DisplayName: JDE Distribution sensor: Orphaned Records F00095
Source.Description: There are orphaned Records in Business Object Reservation (F00095)

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'JDE Distribution sensor: Orphaned Records F00095' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'Orphaned_Records_F00095:' || s.Orphaned_Records_F00095 key_data FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) Orphaned_Records_F00095 FROM CRPDTA.F00095 WHERE (A1UPMJ = (1000*(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'))-1900) + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DDD')) - 1) AND (3600 < ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24')) * 3600 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MI')) * 60 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'SS'))) + 86399 - (floor(A1UPMT / 10000) * 3600 + floor( (A1UPMT - floor(A1UPMT / 10000) * 10000) / 100) * 60 + A1UPMT - floor(A1UPMT / 10000) * 10000 - floor( (A1UPMT - floor(A1UPMT / 10000) * 10000) / 100) * 100))) ) OR (A1UPMJ = (1000*(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'))-1900) + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DDD'))) AND (3600 < ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24')) * 3600 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MI')) * 60 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'SS'))) - (floor(A1UPMT / 10000) * 3600 + floor( (A1UPMT - floor(A1UPMT / 10000) * 10000) / 100) * 60 + A1UPMT - floor(A1UPMT / 10000) * 10000 - floor( (A1UPMT - floor(A1UPMT / 10000) * 10000) / 100) * 100))) )OR A1GENKEY LIKE ' ' OR A1GENKEY IS NULL) s
